eu.wauz.wauzcore.skills.particles

Class ParticleSpawner

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.wauz.wauzcore.skills.particles.ParticleSpawner

  • public class ParticleSpawner
extends java.lang.Object
    A collection of methods to spawn particles in different shapes and animations.
    Author:
    Wauzmons
    See Also:
    SkillParticle

      • spawnParticleLine

        public static void spawnParticleLine(org.bukkit.Location origin,
                                     org.bukkit.Location target,
                                     SkillParticle particle,
                                     int amount)
        Creates a line of particles between two locations.
        Parameters:
        origin - Where the particles should originate.
        target - Where the particles should lead to.
        particle - The type of particle to spawn.
        amount - The amount of particles to spawn.

      • spawnParticleLine

                                     int amount,
                                     double spacing)
        Creates a line of particles between two locations.
        Parameters:
        origin - Where the particles should originate.
        target - Where the particles should lead to.
        particle - The type of particle to spawn.
        amount - The amount of particles to spawn.
        spacing - The spacing between particles.

                                       double radius,
                                       int amount)

        Parameters:
        player - The player who should see the particles.
        origin - Where the particles should originate.
        particle - The type of particle to spawn.
        radius - The radius of the circle.
        amount - The amount of particles to spawn.
